bug.short_desc: mobile show case is not rendering on PlayBook (blackberry RIM)

long_desc.thetext:
The mobile show case is not rendering (showing the content on neither left or right panels), until I rotate my playbook, and the app triggers a refresh.
This happens on my PlayBook. I do not have any other tablets to test that.
Update: app-feedreader-mobile has the same problem: it will not completely render the screen, until it rotate the device 90 degrees.

I discovered this issue, in last weeks mobile showcase, too. I fixed it already, 2 days ago. Have a look at mobile showcase after 20th of July, when qooxdoo 2.0 is released.
Great to here that there are other Playbook users out there. I like the Playbook very much!
I tested the mobile showcase on Playbook several times, at home. qx.Mobile works perfectly on it. (without above mentioned, already fixed bug, of course =) )
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
